name: Mahjong Contest - Tile Matching Tournaments
description:
Live your passion for Mahjong in real tournaments.
Play Mahjong Contest for free or play for real money prizes.

Mahjong Contest is new tournament version of Mahjong Worlds where you can compete against real players from all around the world in one of the best Mahjong game on the market.

This special edition of Mahjong Contest features the Skillz game platform - eSports for Everyone. It provides leaderboards, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing!
Start winning with Mahjong Contest.

Solve mind-bending Mahjong solitaire puzzles while worlds of constant adventure in Mahjong Contest! Travel the globe training your Mahjong skills over 100+ levels! Match Mahjong tiles to clear them from the board. Time your matching to

start combos and earn even more points!


Features:

• Skillz Multiplayer platform - Play for cash prizes against other players on your iPhone or iPad
• Over 100 unique levels;
• 5 different backgrounds;
Explore exotic environments like El Dorado, Camelot, Fairy Tales, Madagascar, Jungle!
• Gorgeous graphics with 5 different tile sets!
Play Mahjong solitaire games in themes: choose the background and tileset and submerge in the environment!
• 5 different tunes;
Choose unique music! Enjoy the lush sounds of Madagascar or the sparse beauty of jungle as you adventure across the universe. Or go back in time with Camelot.
• Combo system for bonus scores!
Tap on tiles faster to rack up a higher score, but watch out – you lose when you can’t match any more tiles. Can you blast through these challenging brain teasers without missing a match?
